title: Mitigating climate change using alternate energy

content.prompt: Which of the following best illustrates a mitigation approach to climate change?

choices.label: Increasing the proportion of commercial energy that is produced by wind farms
Increasing the global land area that is devoted to agriculture
Increasing the global sales of air conditioners
Decreasing the price of gasoline for automobiles
Decreasing the cost of electricity derived from coal-fired power plants

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
